message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I believe a starting price of $1,600,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within $1,000,000. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $1,100,000?
Bob, I understand your position, but my original price reflects the true value of this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $1,350,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I understand the value of the product, I am still aiming to keep my investment under $1,000,000. Could we possibly agree on $1,200,000?
